original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dirattatirattaṁ senāya vasamānā uyyodhikampi balaggampi senābyūhampi anīkadassanampi gacchanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū dirattatirattam senāya vasamānāḥ uyyodhikam pi balaggam pi senā byūham pi anīkadassanam pi gacchanti

original: Aññataropi chabbaggiyo bhikkhu uyyodhikaṁ gantvā kaṇḍena paṭividdho hoti.
analyzed: aññataraḥ api chabbaggiyaḥ bhikkhu uyyodhikam gantvā kaṇḍena paṭividdhaḥ hoti

original: “kacci, bhante, suyuddhaṁ ahosi, kati te lakkhāni laddhānī”ti?
analyzed: kacci bhante su yuddham ahosi kati te lakkhāni laddhāni iti

original: So bhikkhu tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamāno maṅku ahosi.
analyzed: saḥ bhikkhu tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamānaḥ maṅku ahosi

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā uyyodhikaṁ dassanāya āgacchissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyāḥ uyyodhikam dassanāya āgacchissanti

original: Amhākampi alābhā, amhākampi dulladdhaṁ, ye mayaṁ ājīvassa hetu puttadārassa kāraṇā uyyodhikaṁ āgacchāmā”ti.
analyzed: amhākam pi alābhāḥ amhākam pi dulladdha ye mayam ājīvassa hetu putta dārassa kāraṇā uyyodhikam āgacchāma ati

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyodhikaṁ dassanāya gacchissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū uyyodhikam dassanāya gacchissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, uyyodhikaṁ dassanāya gacchathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave uyyodhikam dassanāya gacchatha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, uyyodhikaṁ dassanāya gacchissatha.
analyzed: kathan hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ uyyodhikam dassanāya gacchissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Dirattatirattañce bhikkhu senāya vasamāno uyyodhikaṁ vā balaggaṁ vā senābyūhaṁ vā anīkadassanaṁ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhu senāya vasamānaḥ uyyodhikam vā balaggam vā senā byūham vā anīkadassanam vā gaccheyya pācittiyan ti

original: ettakā hatthī, ettakā assā, ettakā rathā, ettakā pattī.
analyzed: ettakāḥ hatthī ettakāḥ assāḥ ettakāḥ rathāḥ ettakā pattī

original: ito hatthī hontu, ito assā hontu, ito rathā hontu, ito pattikā hontu.
analyzed: itas hatthī hontu itas assāḥ hontu itas rathāḥ hontu itas pattikāḥ hontu
hattha anīka assa anīka ratha anīka patta anīka

original: Tayo hatthī pacchimaṁ hatthānīkaṁ, tayo assā pacchimaṁ assānīkaṁ, tayo rathā pacchimaṁ rathānīkaṁ, cattāro purisā sarahatthā pattī pacchimaṁ pattānīkaṁ.
analyzed: tayaḥ hatthī pacchimam hattha anīka tayaḥ assā pacchimam assa anīka tayaḥ rathā pacchimam ratha anīka cattāro purisā sara hatthā pattī pacchimam patta anīka

original: Dassanūpacāraṁ vijahitvā punappunaṁ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: dassana upacāram vijahitvā punappunam passati āpatti pācittiyassa
ekam ekam dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Dassanūpacāraṁ vijahitvā punappunaṁ passati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: dassana upacāram vijahitvā punappunam passati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: bhikkhussa ṭhitokāsaṁ vā nisinnokāsaṁ vā nipannokāsaṁ vā āgantvā sampahāro dissati,
analyzed: bhikkhussa ṭhita ukāsam vā nisinna ukāsam vā nipanna ukāsam vā āgantvā sampahāraḥ dissati
